review: I bought my Chromecast about a month or two ago on Amazon and loved it. I watched youtube videos, netflix, and google play and never a problem. Recently I started having problems with youtube. It wont play the video and I get an error message that says "There was an error playing this video, please choose another video" I get this message constantly on youtube and it has gotten to the point that I get it every time.Earlier today the device showed that it was installing an update but since then it has been almost completely unable to cast from youtube. I now have a device that is great for netflix but youtube is no longer an option. I gave it a 2 because I can you youtube but I am very unhappy that I cant use youtube at all. I searched the net and found countless people who had the same problem. Just search Chromecast and There was an error playing this video, please choose another video and you will quick;y get the idea. If you want it for netflix, great, for youtube, good luck.  I just cant figure out why it worked so well with youtube for awhile and then crapped out. Piece of crap.
author: Garland Nixon

review: I owned roku xs 2 before I ordered chromecast.I used them both simultaneously. I plugged roku to my receiver if I want to pass the sound through my sound system. The chromecast connected directly to TV.The main difference between google and roku is with roku, you have to browse every channel to get what you want. Yes, there are cast apps too on the roku but still need to go through multiple steps.With chromecast, you can instantly cast anything even from your web browser. No need to go through multiple steps. Quality of sound & picture very similiar to roku.I loved the flexibility of it. Plus google plan to invest more on developing the apps for chromecast in 2014 is very promising. go get it before the price goes up.
